item.title: Scrimba: Learn React
item.description: source Intro The easiest way to learn something is the hard way learn by doing avoid “tutorial hell” by watching school: goal of learning is good grade. Here to be able to write react code. Repetition is your best friend when it comes to learn something Don’t binge the course Your brain needs rest. Take breaks often. Re-watch past lessons. Esp. when stuck. Ask community on discord, if in doubt. First thing to learn: how to think in react?
